steps: Watch YouTube guide: https://youtu.be/j18yicimeiM?si=jolcFVFsQKpqBXdG
Remove mods affecting Link's animation/model (like Linkle and Zelda's Ballad)
Remerge mods in BCML
Check firewall configuration
Enable Extended Memory in CEMU Graphics Packs
Verify Extended Memory is enabled
Check CEMU directory paths in BCML
Ensure DLC 80 and UPDATE 208 are installed
Uninstall any other BCML mods
Reinstall BNPs in BCML

issues.problem: Game crashes when loading into menu
steps: Use CEMU version 1.26.2f
Verify Extended Memory and multiplayer utilities are enabled
Check mods order (classic above multiplayer)
Verify paths are correct in BCML
Verify your name in the app does not have any special characters
Reinstall BNPs in BCML

issues.problem: Can't see multiplayer utilities graphics pack
steps: Reinstall BNPs in BCML
Verify mods order (classic above multiplayer)
Ensure you are using CEMU version 1.26.2f

issues.problem: Issues connecting to server with hamachi/radmin (server closed)
steps: Try to ping each other in hamachi/radmin
if the ping fails, check firewall tutorial
Manually add hamachi IP into ServerConfig.ini
Verify you and other people are using the correct IP and port
Restart server

issues.problem: An error occured trying to start process
steps: Run the exe as administrator

issues.problem: Pipe has not been connected yet/All pipe instances are busy
steps: Restart the app
Ensure you have both C++ and dotnet 6 runtime installed
Move all multiplayer files to the root of the C drive

issues.problem: The app/server won't open or crashes instantly
steps: Ensure you have both C++ and dotnet 6 runtime installed
Move all multiplayer files to the root of the C drive
Make sure you have a settings file in AppData/local/bcml
Delete all files and folders in /AppData/Local/Breath_of_the_Wild_Multip
Ensure you installed the mods in BCML and remerge them
Verify the BCML data directory is AppData/local/bcml
Ensure dotnet 8 is installed

issues.problem: The server shows a red error (cannot create a file that already exists)
steps: Delete the Logs folder

issues.problem: The game doesn't launch after clicking connect
steps: Verify the CEMU path in BCML is correct
Open CEMU and run BOTW one time, close CEMU and try the multiplayer launcher again

issues.problem: Infinite load when loading a save
steps: Restart your game until it works
If it doesn't work after restarting 5 times, disable the mod and try creating a save in a different location on the map, then try loading the new save with the mod enabled

issues.problem: Link is bald/armors won't show up
steps: Make sure you downloaded python 3.8.10 from the python website and not the Microsoft store.
Uninstall python and install it again
